cab.content: COSecret. - ""1076bociirriant is the Property of *' 22F?'o?n Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,5th September 1919.(Received 6tb.)121321. 5th September. Malleson wires 4th September : " Kerki Agent writes 23rd August. Amoug Turcomans on the left bank of Oxus secret warfare preparations continue. The Amir of Bokhara is at the back of this. There are 8,000 or more Turcomans available, but only about 1,200 have rides. It is said that Khiva and Bokhara are co-operating closely for defence against the Bolsheviks."
